post.text: Thank you to my amazing supporters outside of Trump Tower this afternoon. #ImWithYou

comment.author: Nicole
comment.text: I do support you. While your language was x rated...that was 11 years ago. You are a Christian now and I do expect your behavior to be above board. God is your boss. May I suggest that you get back with some seasoned Christians on a regular basis. Romans 8:28 I do believe that all things work together for good for those that love God and are called according to His Purpose. I believe you have been called.

replies.author: Danielle
replies.text: Last year, Trump told CNN he does not like having to ask God for forgiveness. In an interview with columnist Cal Thomas earlier this year, Trump said he would ask for forgiveness. "I will be asking for forgiveness, but hopefully I won't have to be asking for much forgiveness," he said.

replies.author: David
replies.text: Religion and politics should never ever come into play.

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: They are throwing everything they can at him! It's not working and will not work! We are in the midst of an electoral revolution! Vote Trump!!!!!

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: Trump isn't running for Sunday School teacher. Keep being his sheep tho.
